levels.description:
Attack Range changes, <$ba.addash>Moves</> to the position of the Reconstruction, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Attack Interval reduces, Block <@ba.vup>+{block_cnt}</>, Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp}</>, loses <@ba.vdown>{damage_per_second}</> HP per second, attacks all blocked enemies, attacks deal <@ba.vup>True</> damage, and attacks heal self by <@ba.vup>{attack@heal_scale:0%}</> ATK
<@ba.rem>When skill ends or lethal damage is taken, Mon3tr returns to her original position</>
